import numpy as np
import pandas as pd 
import seaborn as sns
import plotly.express as px

import warnings
warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")
source.351c7016:
# Using Iris dataset for it's small number of columns for easy interpretability

data = sns.load_dataset("iris")
data.head(10).style.applymap(lambda x : "background-color: #e4d1eb")
source.5c9ce283:
from pandas_profiling import ProfileReport
pp = ProfileReport(data, title = 'EDA', progress_bar=False)
pp
source.9c1c6dff:
from autoviz.AutoViz_Class import AutoViz_Class
AV = AutoViz_Class()
av = AV.AutoViz('',
             sep=',',
             dfte=data,
             verbose=0)
source.c894b392:
import sweetviz as sv

# In SeetViz, TARGET values can only be of NUMERICAL or BOOLEAN type for now.

sv_report = sv.analyze(data)
sv_report.show_notebook()

source.c04c5c77:
import timeit

time_pp = timeit.timeit(lambda: ProfileReport(data),number=1)
time_av = timeit.timeit(lambda: AV.AutoViz('', dfte = data),number=1)
time_dp = timeit.timeit(lambda: create_report(data), number=1)
time_sv = timeit.timeit(lambda: sv.analyze(data), number=1)
time_dt = 1.47 # Calculated
source.a0440062:
time = {'Package' :['Pandas Profiling', 'Autoviz', 'Dataprep', 'SweetViz', 'D-Tale'],
           'Time' : [time_pp, time_av, time_dp, time_sv, time_dt]}

time = pd.DataFrame(time).sort_values('Time', ignore_index=True)
time.Time = time.Time.round(2)

fig = px.line(time,
            x = time.Package,
            y = time.Time,
            text=time.Time,
        )
fig.update_traces(textposition = 'bottom right')
fig.update_layout(title = 'Time(seconds) taken by Packages',
                  plot_bgcolor = '#e4d1eb')

fig.show()
